data.name: SteamVR
data.detailed_description:
Compatibility

Enjoy all of your Steam content on the most popular virtual reality headsets with SteamVR. SteamVR supports HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows Mixed Reality headsets, and others.

VR Status Window

Stay informed of VR system status and tweak settings with the ever present easy-to-use window.

Chaperone

Everyone's play area is a little different. Chaperone allows you to set and view the boundaries of the space available in your room so you can be aware of your space while immersed in VR.

SteamVR Home

Explore SteamVR Home, an interactive launch pad for your VR experiences. Customize your SteamVR Home with new environments and props created by the community. Socialize with friends and other players with the built in social functions. Customize your own avatar with additional wearables and props that can be found by completing quests in other SteamVR Home environments. Create and submit your own SteamVR Home with SteamVR Workshop Tools.

SteamVR Dashboard

With the touch of a button the dashboard allows you to quickly switch games, browse the Steam Store, and interact with your PC desktop at any time.

data.short_description: Grab SteamVR to access and play VR games using your HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows Mixed Reality headset, or any other supported VR headset and controllers.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or newer, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
